prompt.title: Active Senior Couple Reviewing Benefits
prompt.prompt:
A warm, authentic scene captures a healthy senior couple in their late 60s sitting at their kitchen table, natural morning light streaming through windows. The woman, with silver hair and reading glasses, points to a tablet screen showing healthcare benefits while her husband smiles, holding a coffee mug. Papers with visible text 'Medicare Savings' are spread on the wooden table. Their expressions show relief and satisfaction. The modern but cozy kitchen has plants and family photos visible in soft focus background, creating a homey atmosphere that resonates with security and smart decision-making.
      
Technical Requirements:
- Aspect ratio: 16:9
- Resolution: 1920x1080
- Style: Photorealistic, professional
35mm lens equivalent, f/2.8 aperture for shallow depth of field,Natural window light, 5500K color temperature,ISO 200 for minimal noise,Eye-level angle, documentary style framing,Soft contrast, slightly warm color grade

No corporate stock photo aesthetics, no perfectly styled models, no sterile environments, no unrealistic technology, no brand logos

stylingNotes: Casual but neat clothing (button-down shirt, comfortable sweater)

prompt.title: Satisfied Medicare Beneficiary Portrait
prompt.prompt:
Close portrait of a genuine 72-year-old man with kind eyes and natural smile lines, wearing a comfortable polo shirt. Shot against a softly blurred living room background with warm, diffused window light illuminating his face from the side. His expression conveys genuine satisfaction and peace of mind. The lighting emphasizes his authentic features while maintaining dignity and warmth.
      
Technical Requirements:
- Aspect ratio: 1:1
- Resolution: 400x400
- Style: Photorealistic, professional
85mm lens equivalent, f/2.0 for beautiful bokeh,Soft window light with white reflector fill,ISO 100 for maximum quality,Slight upward angle for dignity,Natural skin tones, minimal retouching

No airbrushing, no forced smiles, no studio lighting, no corporate feel
